word:
Ellen White Wants Lucinda Hall as Governess' Consultant--I did not want you to write or to copy, only it would be a satisfaction to me to read over my matter to you and get your judgment on some points, for I cannot read them to anyone. But this you need not do if it would weary your mind. But if I could have some head in my family, someone whom the children [ADDIE AND MAY WALLING, ELLEN WHITE'S NIECES, WHO MADE THEIR HOME WITH HER.] would feel that they must respect, it would be a great relief to us. . . . 


                                  -33-
